name: Tree Rings | Tree of Life
description: The lines resemble the rings inside a tree. I did this because my last name means forest, so I thought it was a fun idea. The code is adapted from a tutorial by Ahmad Moussa.

name: Tree Rings | Version 1 | Spinning tree
description: An adapted version of the tree rings. The rings spin in a circle, creating what could be interpreted as a thicker tree ring. Or just a circle, however you see it.

name: Tree Rings | Version 2 | Topographic map
description: The tree rings evolved into somehting that resembles a topographic map. The curves are hills and valleys.

name: Perlin Noise | Version 1 | Box It
description: I liked the idea of using perlin noise to create multiple boxes. It created a visual that is difficult but fun to look at.

name: Perlin Noise | Version 2 | Nyan Cat
description: This artwork is inspired by the popular video called Nyan Cat. Even without the cat-attributes it is still very recognisable. The code is adapted from Garrits tutorial.
